place_description: Lottie’s Cafe is a cafe for the modern diner. Located in Uptown Charlotte, we are a coffee shop with extended food and tea offerings. All espresso and food is hand crafted. We feature a full espresso program, matcha, breakfast and lunch. We also offer Charlotte themed souvenirs and gifts.

reviews_data.review_text: Great location and coffee!
The cappuccino was delicious and a super cute place to work at.
such a cute cafe! the airplane latte was delicious and not too sweet. the staff are very friendly. the location itself is very bright and aesthetically pleasing.
Very cozy cafe. High quality coffee!
The food and coffee there are really delicious! Tried Deluxe Avocado Toast and French fries (which are more like potato bites) with a side of bacon and a cappuccino.

Great little cafe with good atmosphere and free wi-fi. Ended up with a free barista-made coffee due to the last day of a promo event. Due to the promo event, the food did take a little longer but they checked with me when ordering if that was okay.

Unfortunately it seems that someone else took a small part of my food order (on a seperate plate), but the staff were doing the best they could and they had my back

This place is the BESt coffee shop in Charlotte! The staff are so nice and attentive. It's a great place to come and work while
Enjoying some yummy food and an even better latte! 10 out of 10!!!

Amazing location!! Today was my first day visiting after hearing wonderful things. It was so busy today! Some event with Home Depot providing free coffee and a donut had the place jam packed. The staff was very delightful and had a decent pace under such a heavy workload from traffic. Food was great, I recommend a hash bowl! My latte was cool and tasty. Someone came to my table to check on me and collect my plate (that I licked clean), I'll be back for sure!!!
My experience is always great when I come to Lotties! Ashley brought me my items and made sure I had everything I needed, I will 100% be back!

Lottie's was such an amazing experience. From the moment you walk in to the time you leave you feel the welcoming energy. Ashley was amazing. She bought my food and drinks right to my table. Definitely will be coming back.

The hash bowl is so good and despite being super busy today, staff was as accommodating as they could be. I'm super glad to see a woman owned business ess thriving!! I hope they keep going and thriving.

The most wonderful experience at Lottie's Cafe! We went when it was very busy which I took as a good sign. The staff was amazing, the food was hot and delicious, and the coffee was made with love! and you can tell the staff was experienced!!

Kudos to the kitchen for making such delicious food during such a rush! Can't wait to come back!!

I love spending time at Lottie's! The aesthetic is everything and staff is so accommodating. I'll stop by for a change of scenery while working or a weekend pick me up! My favorites are the matcha and Hugo Hash.

Heard great things about this place but unfortunately my visit was not great at all. Waited for about 45 minutes for 3 bagel sandwiches. Once the bagels were finally given to us one was wrong. They went back to change it, as I am watching them the cook touched my bagel with his bare hands. Which is very disgusting. Water spilled on the table and floor we told them and they said there are napkins over there. What kind of service is that? Not happy with this visit at all!

Really great spot, would for sure recommend stopping in! We had the iced coffee, the airplane donut & blueberry muffin, and all were spot on. The staff were super friendly & the shop was so cute to be in. Wish we would have tried more!
I stopped by to have a coffee and enjoyed the space. I'll certainly be frequenting here more often.

Black Owned. Located at the Epi Center. Good food and drinks. Great hang out spot. I spent $15 on my pork, egg, and cheese bagel sandwich and a biscotti iced coffee ( you can't beat it). Indoor and outdoor seating. Parking decks are nearby, but I came on a Sunday and metered parking was cheaper/free.

This place is so cute and clean. My husband and I decided to go for our weekly family meeting and loved it. We both and the Airplane Latte, mine iced and his hot, delicious. The food was an outstanding too. We will be back for sure.

Fantastic atmosphere! Friendly staff, great seating amd the recommended Hot Airplane Latte that was suggested to me was very good.
Highly recommend this cafe!
Bagels were good but coffee wasn't up to the mark

Lottie's was a lovely find for us while traveling in Charlotte. The food and drinks were absolutely delicious, the vibe was bright, clean, and relaxed, and the staff could not have been nicer. Definitely stop here if you have the chance!

First time trying today and was AMAZING!!! Friendly and welcoming Woman on the register, even spelled my name right!  because they are so many different spellings of my name. Ordered a Chai Tea Latte and caramel  which was thee BEST  that I've ever had!!! Well worth the money!!!! Beautiful decorations and was quite busy. Highly recommend and will be back! Thank you for making my morning!

This naturally sun lit coffee shop was very pleasant. I love that they serve breakfast all day and have plenty of seating. I was able to vibe out and get a lot of work done. And did I mention it is Black-Owned in the heart of the city!
This might have been the best donut I've ever had. Such a great spot to relax with a good cup of coffee.
This cafe was so inviting. From the atmosphere to the service, you will feel so welcome and comfortable. Will definitely visit again while in NC.

This place is highly underrated. There are no words that will do it justice. From the perfectly presented and delicious bagel to the excellent customer service, this is truly a great place. Indulge yourself in the delicious airplane latte made to perfection and topped off with a biscoff. I also had the pleasure to try the airplane donut, but it was so good that I forgot to take a picture of it. If you're craving a great breakfast, this is the place to go!

Amazing coffee, engaging staff and ... rosemary honey donuts.
Whoops, who ate that?
Great spot for coffee and food! The deluxe avo is delicious and the lattes and americanos were well made.

I visited this cafe and had eggs, turkey sausage patties, and a matcha, and everything was absolutely delicious! They were also incredibly accommodating when it came to my food allergies, which made the experience even better. The staff was friendly and attentive, and I really appreciated how thoughtful they were. I can't wait to come back again soon!

P.S. The brisket French toast was my nieces and she said it was delicious also.
Went by for breakfast on a road trip with my friends. Food/coffee was excellent, and the staff was super friendly. Fantastic way to start the day.
Coffee was good.  I got their seasonal wonderland. It was not a cup of sugar.  I could taste the spices.

I came to this unassuming coffee shop back when it was only a few months old. And almost ever single day, I have made it a priority to spend my morning here. Absolutely wonderful coffee and food, and the servers are a delight to get to know. Happy to be a regular here and happy to have found this place. Highly recommend.
Amazing coffee, staff was very nice. Cozy vibe and great food. 10/10 would go again.

LOTTIES CAFE. Is so amazing, the workers are so nice. The food is to die for. I visited NC Charlotte two weeks ago and I went back to Lottie's twice in my weekend trip. Most definitely will be going back soon

I love coming to Lottie's Cafe.  The atmosphere is always welcoming and the teas are delicious!  I also enjoyed the pastries! It is a gorgeous space!

Thank you for the outstanding service!
Wonderful and cute coffee shop. Lattes were delicious!
We were in town visiting family and happened into Lottie's. Aside from the great coffee drinks and food, the staff is phenomenal! And a special shout out to Teagan, who was our barista.

I dined at Lottie's on Sunday with my grandchildren. They were so attentive to the little ones and my decaf latte was perfect. I tried the Savory French Toast and I am a big fan. Though I do not live close, I hope to get back to Lottie's again soon. Charlotte, you have a true gem in the middle of Uptown.

I pass this place every day and figured I would give it a try. That proved to be one of the worst mistakes I've made in awhile. I ordered a quadruple espresso, and I watched the employee only make 2 shots, so they essentially ripped me off, but that's beside the point. This drink was vile! Hands down, the worst espresso/coffee I've ever had in my life-- actually, I think it was the worst drink I've ever had in my life. Period. I don't know if they were trying to play a prank, or simply forgot the clean the machine. But, it tasted like they put about half a cup of salt into the coffee, or possibly some cleaning solution. This was awful, and I regret even trying this place. Please do yourself, and your taste buds, a favor and avoid this place at all costs!

I had such a great time at the bagel shop! Damien, the super energetic and friendly guy behind the counter, made the whole experience even better. His enthusiasm was infectious, and he made ordering a breeze. The Christmas decorations were absolutely charming, adding a cozy, festive vibe to the whole place. It's the perfect spot to relax, hang out, or even knock out some homework. Definitely a 10/10 I highly recommend!

Lottie's has quickly become one of my favorite places to be. The ladies and a few gentlemen behind the counter are friendly and attentive. It honestly feels like a little hometown shop in the middle of the city. I will be back!
Nice place but the service is awful.
It has such a cozy atmosphere and its spacious. The airplane latte was incredible.

Legit the best coffee shop ive been to in a long time. There is of course many good ones in clt but this one surpasses them by far. Its a cozy vibe as soon as you enter! But the breakfast sandwich I had ...... CMON it was totally made with love and you can't get that just anywhere. The snickerdoodle latte I had with oatmilk was so smooth I felt like I was drinking a cinnamon cloud but like with espresso and oatmilk ofc. The staff is so nice too I just wanted to give everyone a hug for providing such a nice cafe. I love lottie's and after this experience, I feel like lottie's loves me too

I absolutely love this coffee shop--it's the perfect spot to unwind with a cup of expertly brewed coffee. The staff is always welcoming and goes out of their way to make sure every visit feels personal and pleasant. With its cozy vibe and delicious drinks, it's become my go-to place!

Food is fresh and delicious! Service is friendly and personable! Atmosphere is clean, comfortable, and luxurious. I took my daughter here and they treated us like family. 10/10 highly recommend! If you're in the city and you want some DELICIOUS pastries, coffee, or espresso, skip Starbucks and come to Lottie's!

Traveling up to Virginia & I'm so glad we stopped here for breakfast and coffee. Amazing staff and the biscoff donut is 10/10! Came in when they were restocking sweatshirts and the owner/staff made sure I got a discount. Will definitely add to my favorites list next time I'm in Charlotte

Happened upon this gem this morning. It is everything I love about a locally owned coffee shop. First, the coffee is delicious. And though I didn't eat, I saw some excellent looking food coming out of the kitchen. Service was friendly and fast, but didn't feel rushed. Had just enough time to pick up a couple of Christmas gifts from their stash of local items.
Wonderful cafe with great service! If you want more food go for a bagel. If you just want something sweet, they have wonderful pasties and donuts!

I am so grateful I found this gem while visiting Charlotte for work. Excellent coffee, great vibes, and fantastic music! It's the kind of place you can go and feel like you're walking into a real person's vision for their business. It's such an honest place!
Sensational gem in uptown. The staff is wonderful and they treat you like family. My "picky" 6&8 year olds ate four plates of food. This place doesn't just fill the belly, it fills your soul
Brunch options are so good. And coffee was delicious. Everyone greets you with a smile and it's a pleasant atmosphere. Will definitely be back when we are back in town!
Close by Aloft, much better option than there. Helpful staff, good breakfast sandwich options.  Wish the matcha was stronger but still nice.

oh my goodness!!!! the deluxe avocado toast is probably the best avocado toast i've ever had in my life. the employees were SO kind. there's a lot of workspace in here as well. wishing this business all of the success!!!! i can't wait to become a regular :)

I work in the area and come very often in the morning (every week or so in the morning). This is by far one of my favorite cafe's to visit. Its beautiful to sit inside and the staff is always very friendly to me. Most of the lower reviews talk about a 30-40 min wait time, I have not experienced this but I do not come at busy times. I tend to only see at most 3 people working on shift so I feel it is reasonable if I do wait. Overall the coffee and the staff always make my mornings a wonderful experience.
My cousin and I got the Hugo's Hash, and it was absolutely delicious. The atmosphere is so welcoming and the owner was wonderful. Can't recommend enough!
amazing and kind staff. food was phenomenal. there was a bit of a line to order, and then food took a bit to come out, but the staff were so considerate and the wait was absolutely worth it.
Lovely breakfast, very friendly staff.

I'm so glad Lottie's opened in Charlotte. We needed this.

They are a great addition to Uptown and the rebranded EpiCenter which is now known as The Queen City Quarter. As one of their anchor tenants, they're in a prime and accessible location. You can dine inside or at one of the few tables on the patio.

The food here is delicious. It's prepared by a local chef, Maria Martinez, who is a young phenomenon. The owner Ashley is amazing and the two of them work together to bring some of the most balanced, nutritious, and comforting dishes to life.

Service here is also exceptional. One of my favorite things to do when in I'm here is to chat with staff. They are pleasant it feels like you've stopped in your neighborhood corner cafe.

It honestly gives my Lowcountry vibes with the linen, open and bright vibes.

Sometimes, there are out of my favorite things, but I don't hold it against them. They're busy and that's a good thing. I love to see small businesses flourishing and I hope to support them during their tenure Uptown -- and maybe you will too!

Fave items: Hugo's Hash, Beattie's Bagel, George's Sammie, the BBQ Chicken Flatbread, and the Shrimp & Grits when they have them! Don't sleep on the Airplane Latte or their chai tea latte options. Always great!
Very nice staff and a cute spot. Lots of breakfast options, as well.

10/10 experience. Food + drinks were wonderful. The entire team is phenomenal - ran my takeout order outside to my car because I couldn't find parking on a busy Saturday afternoon. The coffee shop gem of Charlotte!!!

I was in town this past weekend for the game and my friend and I decided to stop at Lottie's on our way to the stadium. I instantly fell in love with the atmosphere as soon as we walked in. The space was so cute and clean. The ladies working were all extremely sweet and you could really tell that they truly love their job. I got the Airplane Latte which exceeded my expectations, so delicious!  I wish I lived in Charlotte just so I could stop by Lottie's every morning! Can't wait to come back in the future! :)

I looked for a local coffee shop by my apartment and this place had really good reviews so I went. The atmosphere is beautiful I definitely loved the decor and energy of the place. The lady at the front was so nice and answered all my questions with a smile. I got a coffee and avocado toast it's bacon and cream cheese. For the price I would've liked if they put the cream cheese on my bagel and layered it for me instead of me trying to put it on the outside myself but it was still good so they get 5 stars from me. I definitely will be back. Thank you ladies
What a charming little place! Service, atmosphere, and quality exceeded expectations!
Food and coffee were decent, but the food took quite a long time, and they forgot several items.
Purr latte is very good. Cafe has a great vibe. Looks like the locals come here often to work, socialize. I'll be back.

This place is absolutely amazing! I'm a traveling meeting planner that travels about 80% of the year so finding this beautiful, comfortable, and delicious cafe,  was essential. From the moment I walked in, I knew this was gonna be the place that I would cry leaving. The staff is absolutely phenomenal. The food and coffee is exceptional that I actually had to come back two days in a row and make sure my Colleague came with. Please please do not hesitate and go to this place and experience the amazing time I had. A legit tear came down my face leaving this place today..
Best hot chocolate I've ever had! Apple turnovers were delicious also!
Came in town for an event and grabbed brunch here. Not only was the food amazing, but so was the staff and owner. This is one of the places to visit if you are in Charlotte!!

This was the closest coffee shop near my hotel. During my few days in Charlotte, I came here to work for a couple of hours each day. Great energy, friendly staff, and their beans used were top notch. Definitely a place to meet whether you're here on business, meeting with friends or want to meet for a coffee date.

5 stars all around, food was superb. Definitely worth venturing uptown though I tend to stay away. I recommend the George's Sammie and don't skip out on the home fries! Service was top tier and the ladies are super accommodating. I will be back!
I love love love this cafe! It's the friendly atmosphere and great area for me! The coffee and food is always on point. Best coffee cafe in Charlotte NC
I go to Lottie's all the time. They always remember my name and order. It's so refreshing to receive actual service and proof that southern hospitality is not dead! Highly recommend if you're uptown!
Nice cafe with a very welcoming and organized staff. Bagels were not the best but the handcrafted drinks were. I come here on Sundays, I recommend you stop by!

10/10 cafe! This place is so so cute, incredible vibe, clean, amazing food and coffee! The ladies working today and yesterday truly made me feel so special just by remembering me the next time I came in. If you come to Charlotte, you have to stop in here!! Also the biscoff donut....SO GOOD!!
Lovely little cafe, right by the light rail.

Was visiting from out of town and came to Lottie's because of their good reviews.. unfortunately it took over 40 minutes to get our coffee and our order came out wrong and they didn't have lids for hot coffees. They were also out of a lot of the food items that we tried to order - bagels, avocado, cookie butter. The bathroom was out of toilet paper and the garbages were overflowing. I'm not sure if they just opened or what, but they definitely have some operational logistics that they need to figure out.
Wouldn't recommend coming here if you're in a rush. We ordered an iced latte and a cortado and it took 45 minutes to get our coffee. 45 minutes!!! No coffee is worth that kind of wait.

I'm always looking for new places to write, and I'm thrilled that I stumbled upon Lottie's. The ambiance is lovely! It's bright, comfortable, and inviting. The staff is incredibly warm and friendly. I could hardly contain my delight as I sipped my delicious cup of coffee and gobbled up a perfectly warmed cinnamon sugar donut; it practically melted in my mouth! I'll for sure be back!
Great food, atmosphere, and the owners are exceptional hosts. They really went the extra mile, and we shared some excellent conversation that felt personal and homely. Definitely recommend!

Lottie's is one of the best cafes that I've been to and definitely the best in Charlotte! The whole vibe and ambiance are so calming and feel good, but the staff is what makes it amazing. Everyone is so friendly and welcoming and they make sure your order is perfect. I'm the pickiest matcha drinker and they made sure my matcha latte was best! The owner, Ashley, makes you feel like a friend from the moment you walk through the doors and brings out your order to you directly. Everything from the decor, the furniture, the food and coffees is exquisite. I was in Charlotte for a week while visiting, and came to this cafe almost every morning. Cannot wait to be back!

Omg where do I start ! I ordered 2 different lattes because I had to try them both and food. Everything was perfect ! The guy that took my order was pleasant and the lady that made my latte offered me a refill ! The atmosphere was calm and relaxing so I was able to sit and enjoy my book for atleast a hour and a half. I will definitely be back.
Great coffee

Lovely new coffee shop in the front of the Epicenter. Directly across from the Omni Hotel.

The atmosphere is very relaxing to post up and work from here for the day. I had the everything bagel with scrambled eggs, cheese and bacon bits and it was soooo good. The chef even came out to check on me and make sure everything was good. And this airplane latte...O.M.G sooo good! Definitely recommend!

Very nice new place. The Owner is extremely pleasant and welcoming. The counter folks are pleasant and helpful. The very best part is the ATMOSPHERE: calm, cool, quaint...better than any coffee chain. This how a coffee shop ought to be! Thank you "Lotties" I hope you stay you! Enjoy. peace.

Lovely staff. Lovely building. I had the iced airplane latte. My one negative would be the espresso taste is very mild. I like a smooth latte but it was very very subtle. I loved the appearance and the detail on this latte though. I would maybe try just a regular latte next time to get a vibe for their espresso alone next time.
Best place for breakfast in Charlotte. Friendly staff and great food!
Great cappuccino!
Nice place.  Team was very engaged and invested in the quality experience.  I like that this place gives miles on the AA Dining Program.  Breakfast items are limited and coffee was great.  Cheers!

Um can you say new favorite place???! Lottie's is a great addition to the uptown scene and will definitely be my second home! The perfect stylish place to grab brunch with friends while also a great environment to work or study in. The staff is so friendly and genuine, and let me tell you they sure know how to make a drink! Love love love!!

I visited Lottie's for the first time today. They were very busy but still extremely friendly/attentive. I tried the Hash Bowl and ordered an iced coffee. Everything was delicious and the cafe is beautifully designed. I look forward to coming here with my laptop during the week.
Lottie's you have won my heart!! The staff is so friendly and nice, the menu and the aesthetic of the shop gets a chef kiss! Local or not you must stop by! You won't be disappointed

Outstanding!  We loved everything about this place.  Delicious coffee, perfectly executed avocado toast (I added a scrambled egg and it made a great addition), and super friendly and professional service.  The vibe is just right -- very welcoming, stylish, friendly and laid-back.  Lots of thoughtful details.  And tucked in the corner is a great little mini boutique with super cute stuff.  If I lived in Charlotte, I'd be a regular for sure!
Lottie's is such a thoughtful and beautiful space located in the heart of the city. The gift shop section has so many goodies and the biscoff donut and iced latte were 1000/10.
Amazing staff and great vibes for anytime! Really liked the ambient music and I enjoyed working here for a change of scenery.

We love this adorable new spot. The service was excellent, the food was delicious and everything felt well priced.

I got the hash. The eggs were perfection and the sauce alongside it slaps. So good.
Cute and quaint. Well kept and very nice staff. The only complaint if I was to give one, is my egg should have been over medium. But that's me being picky. Best place on our trip.
Lottie's is such a great addition to the Charlotte coffee scene. You must try the Airplane Latte....it is delicious!! I highly recommend Lottie's!!
The coffee is great and the egg bites are AMAZING!! Everyone is super kind. It was a very pleasant, well rounded experience with great pricing for the uptown area.

The biscoff latte is so yummy and honestly my new favorite drink at the moment. This cafe honestly exceeded all my expectations. The atmosphere is calming, light, and clean. The food is delicious and the staff are so friendly and welcoming. The only downside would be the parking since it's in a busy area so do expect to probably pay for parking.

Had a really great Coffee from here! The inside was super cute and the staff was super nice. I ordered the George's Sammy and really enjoyed it. I think it would be just as good on a croissant. I did have to wait a little longer than I probably wanted to on food but not going to fault them at all for that given they are so new. Highly recommend trying this place out for your next coffee adventure!
The girls in the place were quite nice and definitely has a great vibe going for it. Impressed that they even do the designs for to go drinks.

Such a relaxed, sweet little coffee shop! The service was amazing and all the ladies working were SO kind and lovely. Iced coffee was great! Didn't try the baked goods but I desperately wanted to Would go back for the service alone. Also, they have pup cups that my dog highly recommends

This new cafe in uptown Charlotte is perfectly situated for a quick grab-and-go on your way to work, offering a delicious and varied breakfast menu. Its prime location and quality offerings make it an ideal stop for a morning boost.
